error.answerNotFound: SV Answer not found for question {questionId}
error.invalidAnswer: SV Answer is invalid for question {questionId}
error.questionNotFound: SV Question not found for question {questionId}

ingress.default: SV You can see all of your opinions below and edit them.
ingress.empty: SV Next, the app will ask your opinions on {numQuestions} statements about political issues and values. When voters use the Election Compass, they will also answer the same statements and see how well their opinions agree with the yours.
ingress.partial: SV You can see all of your opinions below, edit them and answer the remaining ones.

notAnswered: SV You didn't answer this question.
tip: SV You can see all your anwers on this page when you come back to it later.
title: SV Your Opinions
unansweredWarning: SV You still have {numUnansweredQuestions} unanswered questions.
